game.name: Ready or Not
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, Co-op, Online Co-op, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Cloud
game.shortDescription: 로스수에뇨스 – LSPD는 로스수에뇨스 지역 전역에서 폭력 범죄가 급증하고 있다고 발표했습니다. 이에 인질, 폭탄 위협, 바리케이드를 세우고 있는 용의자 등 매우 위험한 상황에 대응하기 위해 SWAT 팀이 파견되었습니다. 시민 여러분은 집에 머무시기 바랍니다.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Ready or Not is an intense, tactical, first-person shooter that depicts a modern-day world in which SWAT police units are called to defuse hostile and confronting situations.

reviewHighlights.text: I’m not going to accept censorship even if I can use mods; at the very least, there should be a free DLC on Steam for the original version.
I've been playing Ready Or Not for awhile now. I've thoroughly enjoyed most of it! Recent updates have fundamentally broke the game and censored allot...
